SELECT al.ORDER_ID AS order_id ,al.ID AS id ,al.KIOSK_ID AS kiosk_id ,al.MENU_NAME AS menu_name ,al.MENU_PRICE AS menu_price ,al.MENU_COUNT AS menu_count ,al.OPTIONS AS options ,al.IS_COMPLETED AS is_completed ,al.REGDATE AS regdate ,al.category_id AS category_id ,cm.code_name AS category_name FROM ( SELECT c.ORDER_ID AS order_id ,c.ID AS id ,c.KIOSK_ID AS kiosk_id ,c.MENU_NAME AS menu_name ,c.MENU_PRICE AS menu_price ,c.MENU_COUNT AS menu_count ,c.OPTIONS AS options ,c.IS_COMPLETED AS is_completed ,c.REGDATE AS regdate ,m.category_id AS category_id FROM CART c JOIN menu m on c.MENU_NAME = m.NAME ) al JOIN common cm on al.category_id = cm.code_id
WHERE ORDER_ID = #{order_id} AND IS_COMPLETED = 'false'
WHERE IS_COMPLETED = 'false'
WHERE IS_COMPLETED = 'true'
AND regdate BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND SYSDATE
AND regdate BETWEEN SYSDATE-7 AND SYSDATE
AND regdate BETWEEN SYSDATE-30 AND SYSDATE
AND al.category_id = #{category_id}
SELECT ORDER_ID ,ID ,KIOSK_ID ,MENU_NAME ,MENU_PRICE ,MENU_COUNT ,OPTIONS ,IS_COMPLETED ,REGDATE FROM CART WHERE ID = #{id}
